111321.content:
Gwen was spending a rather lazy day in the RV searching through different websites on her laptop. Her cousin Ben continued to fiddle around with the Omnitrix while their Grandpa Max drove on down the highway. It had been nearly a week since anything interesting had happen, if you find alien attacks and random supernatural events interesting, and the boredom was slowly starting to effect everyone. Heck even Gwen, who would normally be in favor for things being normal for once, was almost starting to wish something would happen. Thankfully the radio decided to liven up their day.

Apparently the nearest town to them was experiencing a very strange epidemic. A new disease, called Balloonemia by the townsfolk, was causing people to blow up like a balloon and float through the air. Thankfully it didn't seem to be fatal in anyway, as the infected would deflate after a few hours. An interesting thing to note was that those that deflated did so in a manner similar to a balloon as well; completely thin like an empty suit (or deflated balloon) until they naturally regained their normal shape. So far the only symptoms of the disease would be two puncture marks on the affected area that began to swell up first, which had many believe that it might have been caused by some kind of animal.

The announcement had mixed reactions from the three listeners. On one hand, Gwen really didn't see any need to go since no one seemed to be in any danger. Plus it meant avoiding getting infected since the last thing she wanted was for Ben to start cracking even more butt jokes. Her cousin, on the other hand, was all for stopping by and checking the place out. Maybe a town infected with a balloon disease would be a good enough excuse to bust out his alien forms and "fix" the problem. In the end, it was up for Max to decide on what to do.

1151311.content:
Gwen can safely say that these last 2 week have been the weirdest of her life. She started thinking that the summer was going to suck since she would have to spend it with her dorky, smelly, arrogant, nut-brained, doofus of a cousin Ben. Then he had to go wondering in the woods, finding some kind of super advanced watch that can turn him into 10 different aliens, almost start a forest fire with one of said aliens and fight some giant killer robot while heroically saving a bunch of innocent campers.

Then he defeated a crazy mad scientist, saved a giant sea alien and her eggs, saved a whole community of old people from getting eaten by shape shifting aliens and fight for his life against a team of alien bounty hunters. Granted she and Grandpa Max helped, in fact it could be argued that Ben couldn't have done any of those things without their help, but still Gwen had to admit when the chips were down Ben was quiet the hero. Not that she would ever tell him that his heads big enough as it is.

"Hey Gwen can ask you for a favor?" Ben asked rather embarrassed.

Gwen raised an eyebrow in suspicion "What kind of favor?"

He rubbed the back of his neck "Y-your pretty good at that Karate stuff right?"

"Along with Judo and Tae Kwon Do." she boasted "Why?"

He took a deep breath to psych himself up "Could you teach me?"

She blinked in surprise before smirking "You want me, a girl, to teach you, the big hero how to fight?" she teased.

He groaned in annoyance "Look as much as I REALLY hate to admit it, I really got my butt kicked in that last fight. The only reason I won is thanks to that Diamondhead guy. And he really kick my butt too at first. So I figured that if I knew how to fight better as Ben I would by extension fight better when I go hero." he reasoned.

Gwen was honestly impressed by Ben's humility and admittedly sound thinking. Just yesterday he was bragging about how much alien butt he kicked thinking that he was, in his own words, "The Baddest Ben around". So to see him ask her of all people to train him was a bit of a shock to say the least. And as she thought about it this would give her the opportunity to mess with him in all sorts of ways. And feed him some humble pie while she was at it.

"Okay Ben. But just a fair warning..I'm not going to go easy on you." she said dramatically.

"I can take anything you can throw at me." he said confidently.

(1 week later.)

Needless to say Gwen was having a blast being Ben's "Sensei". Tossing him to the ground and pinning him, tripping him over when he charge at her like a bull(OLE!), smacking him upside the head when he didn't execute a move correctly and best of all when she forced him to address her as "Sensei" whenever they were training. Oh it was music to her ears.

But now the mood in the Rust Bucket was rather somber as just yesterday got involved with a dangerous young power draining mutant named Kevin 11. At first they seemed to be thick as thieves, but when it was revealed that he was willing to kill hundreds of innocents by crashing a 2 trains together for a quick buck they quickly turned to bitter enemies. It didn't help that Ben had been irresponsible with the Omnitrix(the watch he found) lately. So irresponsible he got them kicked out of the hotel they were going to stay for the night. Grandpa Max was very disappointed him and Gwen could tell that Ben was disappointed in himself.

Normally when Ben was in trouble it made her happy, but this was different. So when the Rust Bucket parked for the night and everyone turned in Gwen climbed out of her bed to talk to Ben.

"What are you here to gloat? You want me to say you were right? Because you were, Kevin was trouble and I should've never gotten involved with him. And just like Kevin I'm a selfish jerk that only cares about himself and I-" his rant was cut off by Gwen wrapping her arms around him in a tender hug.

"True you can be selfish, and a jerk, and irresponsible, and reckless, and a total dweeb."

"Gee thanks a lot Gwen. Really feeling the love."

"But your nothing like Kevin. You don't you don't only care about yourself. I've seen you risk your life for total strangers dozens of times. And while you may misuse the watch from time to time, one of the first things when you found out that people were getting hurt because someone was looking for it was save them. Including me." Gwen then pulled back a little to look at Ben's stunned face with a warm smile. "All Kevin has ever seemed to do with his powers is hurt people and take for his own gain. You just made a mistake and the minute you realized that you tried to make things right. You even showed him mercy and I doubt he would do the same. I know I might tease you and make fun of you when you prove how much of a dweeb you are, but you are a hero Ben. The best I've ever seen." she said sincerely.

Ben was floored by Gwen's speech and really moved by her kindness. Plus he had to admit the hug was nice, especially with those breasts of hers. [Wait, what?!] he thought shocked at himself. [Where did that come from?!] But then he thought back to something Kevin said earlier.

(Flashback)

Kevin: Hey I got to be honest with you, your girlfriend's got great tits.

Ben: Okay first of all she's my cousin,second of all EWW!!

Kevins: *Shrugs* I'm just saying.

(End Flashback)

As much as he would hate to admit it Kevin was right. Gwen did have great tits. Puberty seemed to hit her early and hit her hard as from the looks of it Gwen was reaching C-cup territory despite only being 10 years old. [How did I not notice those before?] he thought to himself.
